channel.title: ULTIMATE StickRPG*C* Script
channel.description: Main script made by M0ng00se Skateboard and House/Castle support added by Zorlin, making it THE BEST stickRPG script that I know of! Based off M0nG00se's leeeeeeeet coding. :| 719 lines of code! :D Enjoy! ( The game can be found at http://xgenstudios.com/play/stickrpg/ ) FEATURING!! [size=10pt]Automatically work, drink beer, study, or go to class![/size] FULL SUPPORT FOR SKATEBOARDS AND/OR HOUSES/CASTLES! Yes! This script will work even once you get a house or castle! (as long as you don't forget to set the constants) :) If it wasnt for M0ng00se this script wouldnt be here. Give a big round of applause for him. Yay mongoose! Anyways, enough chitchat, here's the script! NOTE: For some reason, this script is going a bit funny, I'll try and see if I can fix it :(

item.title: ULTIMATE StickRPG*C* Script
item.dc:creator: @Zorlin Zorlin
item.description:
@Zorlin wrote:

Thank you very much Ron, I neglected to mention that.
I wrote 3/4 of this, but as i said, if it wasnt for m0ng00se it wouldnt be here.
GIVE HIM A BIG HUG IF YOU USE IT!
PS:
Like my sig? :rolleyes:[br][size=1]Posted at: September 07, 2006, 07:51:03 PM[/size][hr]Yay!
[glow=red,2,300]The script is fixed and fully working again, find it attached.
If it doesnt work for you, just change the wait times until it does. :)[/glow]

Read full topic

item.title: ULTIMATE StickRPG*C* Script
item.dc:creator: @Zorlin Zorlin
item.description:
@Zorlin wrote:

Main script made by M0ng00se
Skateboard and House/Castle support added by Zorlin, making it THE BEST stickRPG script that I know of!
Based off M0nG00se’s leeeeeeeet coding.
719 lines of code!
Enjoy! ( The game can be found at http://xgenstudios.com/play/stickrpg/ )
FEATURING!!
[size=10pt]Automatically work, drink beer, study, or go to class![/size]
FULL SUPPORT FOR SKATEBOARDS AND/OR HOUSES/CASTLES!
Yes! This script will work even once you get a house or castle! (as long as you don’t forget to set the constants)

If it wasnt for M0ng00se this script wouldnt be here.
Give a big round of applause for him.
Yay mongoose!
Anyways, enough chitchat, here’s the script!
NOTE:
For some reason, this script is going a bit funny, I’ll try and see if I can fix it

Read full topic
